      • getContent

                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Read the line store it in instr Increment the current file pointer Increment the PC
        Returns:
        instruction

      • moveInstruction

        private static void moveInstruction(java.lang.String cStage,
                                    java.lang.String pStage)
        This function moves the instruction to next stage using latches
        Parameters:
        cStage - Current stage
        pStage - past stage

        Example moveInstruction(E,D)

        If stages contain E --> latches.put(E, stages.get(E));
        If latches contain D -> stages.put(E, latches.get(D));

      • readRegister

        private static java.lang.Integer readRegister(KeyValue<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> pair)
        Read value from Register file if Register file contains key(R0, R1 ..)
        Parameters:
        pair -
        Returns:
        value of register

      • getSRCFromRegister

        private static Instruction getSRCFromRegister(Instruction instruction)
        Check the flow dependencies for both sources of passed instruction with A E M "stages" This method is used to set isSourceValid value Special case for STORE type instruction
        Parameters:
        instruction -
        Returns:
        instruction

      • checkFlowDependencies

        private static boolean checkFlowDependencies(KeyValue<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> src,
                                             java.lang.String stage)
        This function checks the flow dependencies by comparing the sources of instruction in Decode stage with destination of next instructions in "stage"

        If instruction is not STORE If destination of instruction is not NULL If there is same Register in both instruction

        Parameters:
        src - It is the hashmap Keyval which contain register name and its value
        stage - It is the string represent "F" or "D" or ....
        Returns:
        True -if dependencies else false
